response.overview: Two guys and a gal and everyone is your pal-why not go for a three-way that satisfies both worlds. Gay, straight-whatever-everybody gets it on, gets it off and has a really, really good time. There is always more than enough to go around and three is never a crowd. No hole is left un-plundered in this cluster fuck of a good time. It's triple the pleasure for triple the fun where pussies, assholes and pie holes are probed before a double dose of spunk is spewed on those lovely twin peaks.
response.title: M.M.F. Encounters
